message.content:
1. There is a device-specific questionnaire used to measure quality of life.
2. The questionnaire consists of at least 16 questions.
3. There are different arms for the questionnaire, one of which is the TIVAS arm.
4. The quality of life was greater in the TIVAS arm for 13 questions.
5. The quality of life was not greater in the TIVAS arm for at least 3 questions.

messages.content:
Statement: Quality of life based on the device-specific questionnaire was greater in the TIVAS arm for 13 of the 16 questions.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
